name: Info Fetcher
description: Swiftly fetch the info you want from a list

preferences.name: Fetch info
preferences.description: Fuzzy search info and copy content to clipboard

preferences.name: Add info item
preferences.description: Add a new info item to the list of info items

preferences.name: Remove info item
preferences.description: Fuzzy search and remove an info item from the list of info items

preferences.name: Maximum search results
preferences.description: Maximum amount of results that appear when fuzzy searching for info items
